actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 101-832.

official_title: A bill to waive the waiting period requirement of Section 210(b)(2) of title 38, United States Code, for a planned administrative reorganization involving the Loan Guaranty Division at the Togus Veterans Affairs Medical and Regional Office Center.

summary.text: Waives a congressional notification requirement with respect to the transfer of loan guaranty functions from the Togus Veterans' Affairs Medical and Regional Office Center in Maine to the Manchester Veterans' Affairs Regional Office in New Hampshire.

titles.title: A bill to waive the waiting period requirement of Section 210(b)(2) of title 38, United States Code, for a planned administrative reorganization involving the Loan Guaranty Division at the Togus Veterans Affairs Medical and Regional Office Center.
